Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â»-----------------------------------------------------------------------------Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â«

Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â» Possession knows no bounds in this supernatural thriller starring Donald Sutherland and Sissy Spacek. An American Haunting is a harrowing account of the true events of the Bell Witch of Tennessee, the only case of its kind in US History where a spirit or entity caused the death of a man.

With over thirty-five books written on the subject, and a town that continues to live in fear of the return of the unseen spirit, the story is simply terrifying.

It would not be until years later that we would be taken back to the terrible night the spirit was born, to establish the horrific truth about its nature and origin.
